absolutely_our_code_is_open_source_so_yo: Absolutely. Our code is open-source, so you can see for yourself. You can even choose to process your voice entirely on-device.

choose_if_voquill_should_enhance_transcr: Choose if Voquill should enhance transcripts automatically after they are transcribed.
choose_which_microphone_voquill_should_u: Choose which microphone Voquill should use when recording. Automatic picks the best available device each time.
clean_the_languagename_transcript_below_: Clean the {languageName} transcript below. Remove only clear false starts, stutters, repeated sounds, and isolated filler words. Do not remove any complete words, phrases, clauses, or sentences that contribute meaning, emotion, tone, emphasis, or intent. Do not remove or shorten any part of the transcript unless it is purely a disfluency and contains no meaningful content on its own. Do not delete or compress multiple words into fewer words. Do not alter or reorganize the original wording, structure, or flow beyond removing those disfluencies. Here is the transcript: {transcript}
congrats_voquill_is_now_ready_across_you: Congrats! Voquill is now ready across your entire computer. Press your dictation hotkey in any app and let your voice do the typing.
connect_a_transcription_provider_like_gr: Connect a transcription provider like Groq with your API key.
cross_device_sync_voquill_cloud_and_more: Cross-device sync, Voquill Cloud, and more advanced features.
customize_your_keyboard_shortcuts_keyboa: Customize your keyboard shortcuts. Keyboard shortcuts can be triggered from within any app.
decide_how_voquill_should_transcribe_you: Decide how Voquill should transcribe your recordings‚Äîlocally on your machine or through a connected provider.
do_not_mention_these_rules_simply_return: Do not mention these rules; simply return the cleaned transcript.
enter_your_email_and_we_ll_send_a_reset_: Enter your email and we'll send a reset link.
excited_to_have_you_here_we_need_to_run_: Excited to have you here! We need to run through a quick setup to get you started.

installation_in_progress_voquill_may_res: Installation in progress. Voquill may restart automatically when finished.
lets_you_trigger_dictation_hotkeys_while: Lets you trigger dictation hotkeys while using other applications.
local_set_up_is_complicated_and_requires: Local set up is complicated and requires a strong technical background. We recommend the free plan for most users.
manage_your_account_preferences_and_sett: Manage your account preferences and settings.
name: Name
no_ai_post_processing_will_run_on_new_tr: No AI post-processing will run on new transcripts.

no_downloads_or_manual_setup_record_on_a: No downloads or manual setup. Record on any device and we'll keep your data secure, synced, and ready everywhere.
no_warnings_recorded_for_this_transcript: No warnings recorded for this transcription.
password_must_be_at_least_6_characters_l: Password must be at least 6 characters long
pick_the_keys_you_ll_press_to_start_and_: Pick the keys you'll press to start and stop dictation anywhere. You can change this anytime from settings.
pick_the_microphone_you_want_voquill_to_: Pick the microphone you want Voquill to use by default. You can change this later from settings.

please_restart_the_application_for_the_n: Please restart the application for the new permissions to take effect.

press_and_hold_your_hotkey_then_start_ta: Press and hold your hotkey then start talking. Once you release your hotkey, everything you said should be converted into text.

press_record_to_make_sure_your_microphon: Press record to make sure your microphone is working properly.

start_recording_audio_and_transcribe_you: Start recording audio and transcribe your speech into text with AI.
tell_voquill_how_to_enhance_your_transcr: Tell Voquill how to enhance your transcripts after they are created.
this_action_cannot_be_undone_all_your_da: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
this_action_permanently_removes_local_da: This action permanently removes local data
this_will_be_used_in_things_like_email_s: This will be used in things like email signatures and stuff.
this_will_delete_all_preferences_diction: This will delete all preferences, dictionary entries, and saved transcriptions from this device. The action cannot be undone.
to_confirm_type_phrase_below_and_click_c: To confirm, type {phrase} below and click Clear local data.
to_confirm_type_your_email_address_below: To confirm, type your email address below:

used_to_sign_things_like_emails_and_stuf: Used to sign things like emails and stuff
voquill_is_an_ai_dictation_tool_it_needs: Voquill is an AI dictation tool. It needs microphone and accessibility access in order to function properly.
voquill_may_misunderstand_you_on_occasio: Voquill may misunderstand you on occasion. If you see certain words being missed frequently, you can define a replacement rule here to fix the spelling automatically.
voquill_works_on_virtually_any_website_w: Voquill works on virtually any website with text input fields - email clients, social media, forms, documents, and more.

what_websites_does_it_work_on: What websites does it work on?
you_are_a_transcript_rewriting_assistant: You are a transcript rewriting assistant. You modify the style and tone of the transcript while keeping the subject matter the same.

you_haven_t_completed_checkout_yet_click: You haven't completed checkout yet. Click the 'Next' button below to proceed to checkout.
you_re_currently_on_version_version_the_: You're currently on version {version}. The app will restart after the update finishes.
